results.description: Combine price returns and cross-sectional z-scoring. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using close and volume to build a momentum signal; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field); SUGGESTION3: if coverage low, pre-process close with ts_backfill; SUGGESTION4: used common fields (close) assumed high userCount. Confidence set to 0.75 because short-term momentum is a robust effect but sensitive to microstructure/noise.

Identify breakouts where price exceeds recent max and accompanied by volume surge. SUGGESTION1 applied (close + volume). SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: use ts_backfill(volume,5) if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: volume and close are high userCount fields. Confidence 0.68 due to occasional false breakouts.

Short stocks with recent large positive returns and long recent large negative returns (cross-sectional). SUGGESTION1 used only close (single primary field) to keep simple; SUGGESTION2 not applicable; SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5) if needed. SUGGESTION4: close assumed high coverage. Confidence 0.7 for broad-market mean reversion intraday/days.

Long stocks where implied volatility > realized volatility (expect re-pricing). SUGGESTION1 used (implied_vol, historical_vol). SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(implied_vol,10) if sparse. SUGGESTION4: prefer well-populated IV fields. Confidence 0.62 because IV data can be noisy.

Stocks with positive earnings surprise show post-earnings drift. SUGGESTION1 used (earnings_surprise, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(earnings_surprise, 60) if sparse. SUGGESTION4: use commonly available surprise fields. Confidence 0.65; drift exists but event-dependent.

High short_interest combined with rising option volume indicates squeeze potential. SUGGESTION1 applied (short_interest, option_volume). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(short_interest,30) if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: use fields with reasonable userCount. Confidence 0.55 due to episodic nature.

Momentum signal weighted down by high turnover to avoid noisy winners. SUGGESTION1 used (close, turnover). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(turnover,20) if sparse. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.72 since turnover adjustment improves momentum robustness.

Combine price momentum with quality metric (ROE or profit margin) to avoid poor-quality winners. SUGGESTION1 applied (close, roe). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(roe,252) for coverage. SUGGESTION4: prefer fundamentals with decent alphaCount. Confidence 0.7 as quality tilt reduces crashes.

Long stocks with improving earnings revisions but still low valuation. SUGGESTION1 used (earnings_revision, pe_ratio). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(earnings_revision,90). SUGGESTION4: choose widely available fundamentals. Confidence 0.63 because fundamentals adjust slowly.

Stocks that decorrelate from their sector recently may mean-revert. SUGGESTION1 applied (close, sector_close via group); SUGGESTION4: use group operators. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5) if needed. Confidence 0.6; decorrelation signals sometimes noise.

Mean reversion based on large intraday high-low ranges. SUGGESTION1 used (high, low). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(high,5) if needed. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.58; intraday mean reversion exists but execution sensitive.

Momentum as price returns multiplied by recent average traded volume to favor liquid moves. SUGGESTION1 applied (close, volume). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(volume,5) if coverage low. Confidence 0.69: liquidity-weighted momentum is practical.

Long stocks with low historical volatility expecting higher risk-adjusted returns. SUGGESTION1 used (close, market_cap to avoid tiny caps). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,20). SUGGESTION4: prioritize high-coverage vol fields. Confidence 0.66 historically supported.

Stocks with upward trend in analyst earnings revisions show price momentum. SUGGESTION1 used (analyst_revision, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(analyst_revision,90). SUGGESTION4: prefer well-covered analyst fields. Confidence 0.61 as revision momentum is moderate.

Stocks showing large earnings-day gap often revert over next few days. SUGGESTION1 used (close, earnings_date flag). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(earnings_date,5). SUGGESTION4: earnings_date widely available. Confidence 0.6 due to mixed empirical evidence.

When cross-sectional dispersion spikes, expect mean reversion in high-dispersion names. SUGGESTION1 used (close aggregated across group via group_std_dev). SUGGESTION4: use group operators. SUGGESTION3: backfill close if sparse. Confidence 0.58 because dispersion dynamics fluctuate.

Stocks with sudden drop in free-float turnover often recover. SUGGESTION1 used (turnover, free_float). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(turnover,20). SUGGESTION4: prefer well-covered turnover fields. Confidence 0.54 due to execution risk.

Use vector holdings (institutional portfolios) to measure concentration; mean reversion when concentration drops. Applied SUGGESTION2 by vec_avg(holdings_vector). SUGGESTION1 combined with close optionally. SUGGESTION3: backfill holdings_vector with kth_element if sparse. Confidence 0.56; institutional flows informative but lagged.

Momentum signal filtered to exclude firms with deteriorating accruals. SUGGESTION1 used (close, accruals). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(accruals,252). SUGGESTION4: favor common fundamentals. Confidence 0.67 as quality filtering reduces blowups.

Fade overnight gaps: short stocks that gap up, long gap down (mean reversion). SUGGESTION1 used (open, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(open,5). SUGGESTION4: open/close are ubiquitous. Confidence 0.6; execution and costs matter.

When one stock receives analyst upgrade, related peers outperform via sector re-rating. SUGGESTION1 used (analyst_action, group via sector_group). SUGGESTION4: use group operator. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(analyst_action,60). Confidence 0.57; event-driven and episodic.

Apply momentum only in low-volatility regimes; avoid in high-vol. SUGGESTION1 used (close, market_vol). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(market_vol,20). SUGGESTION4: pick widely available market vol. Confidence 0.7 as regime filtering reduces crashes.

Momentum on residual returns after regressing out beta to market and sector. SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_group via group_mean). SUGGESTION3: backfill close. SUGGESTION4: use popular fields. Confidence 0.66 as residual momentum often stronger.

Stocks initiating buybacks often outperform. SUGGESTION1 used (buyback_amount, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(buyback_amount,120). SUGGESTION4: buyback fields can be sparse but impactful. Confidence 0.59 event-driven.
When realized volatility spikes, expect partial mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 used (close, implied_vol optionally). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(implied_vol,20). Confidence 0.6 modest.

Exploit monthly seasonality (month-of-year) with group neutralization. SUGGESTION1 used (close, days_from_last_change perhaps). SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: close high coverage. Confidence 0.52 low but diversifying.
Favor momentum within growth or value buckets separately. SUGGESTION1 used (close, pe_ratio) and SUGGESTION4. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(pe_ratio,252). Confidence 0.64 as tilting by style helps.
Stocks with high implied skewness vs realized show option-driven mispricing. SUGGESTION1 used (implied_skew, realized_skew). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(implied_skew,30). Confidence 0.5 speculative.

Use buy vs sell volume imbalance to predict short-term moves. SUGGESTION1 used (buy_volume, sell_volume). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(buy_volume,5). SUGGESTION4: prefer high-frequency fields. Confidence 0.63 intraday focused.

Combine valuation (low PE) with positive sentiment momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied (pe_ratio, sentiment_score). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(sentiment_score,30). SUGGESTION4: sentiment coverage varies. Confidence 0.58 moderate.
Stocks increasing dividend yield or initiating yields can outperform. SUGGESTION1 used (dividend_yield, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(dividend_yield,252). Confidence 0.55 income-focused.
Favor momentum in stocks with decreasing short_interest (covering). SUGGESTION1 used (short_interest, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(short_interest,60). Confidence 0.56 event-sensitive.

Momentum signal neutralized to market beta per sector. SUGGESTION1 used (close, market_index) and group_neutralize with sector_group. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(market_index,5). Confidence 0.68 to reduce market exposure.
Exploit persistent post-earnings drift in certain months. SUGGESTION1 used (earnings_surprise, month). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(earnings_surprise,365). Confidence 0.54 niche.

Stocks with sustained net inflows to ETFs/ETPs that hold them often trend. SUGGESTION1 used (etf_holdings_change, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(etf_holdings_change,30). Confidence 0.6 as flows matter.

Stocks with rising analyst coverage and positive revisions may outperform. SUGGESTION1 used (analyst_count, earnings_revision). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(analyst_count,365). Confidence 0.53 gradual effect.
Momentum signals strengthened if insiders are buying. SUGGESTION1 used (insider_trades, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(insider_trades,90). Confidence 0.62 insider buying predictive.
Adjust mean-reversion strength inversely by stock beta to avoid high-beta crashes. SUGGESTION1 used (beta, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(beta,60). Confidence 0.65 risk-managed.

Rank returns over past day/week and take contrarian positions. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). SUGGESTION4: close high coverage. Confidence 0.66 classic high-frequency effect.
Momentum scaled by inverse bid-ask spread to avoid illiquid signals. SUGGESTION1 used (close, spread). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(spread,20). Confidence 0.68 practical for execution.
Preference for high dividend yield and stable payout growth. SUGGESTION1 used (dividend_yield, dividend_growth). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(dividend_growth,252). Confidence 0.57 income strategy.

Use social media sentiment momentum to boost price momentum. SUGGESTION1 used (sentiment_score, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(sentiment_score,30). SUGGESTION4: sentiment coverage varies. Confidence 0.54 noisy but diversifying.
Fade extreme moves caused by large block trades: mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 used (block_trade_flag, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(block_trade_flag,5). Confidence 0.52 event-specific.
Long names with positive growth surprises but still low relative valuation. SUGGESTION1 used (revenue_surprise, pe_ratio). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(revenue_surprise,180). Confidence 0.6 balanced.
Target takeover candidates with premium signals (low float, insider buys). SUGGESTION1 used (float, insider_trades). SUGGESTION3: backfill float if needed. Confidence 0.48 speculative.
Apply short-term reversal within market-cap buckets to control size effect. SUGGESTION1 used (close, market_cap). SUGGESTION4: market_cap common. Confidence 0.65 bucketing useful.
Strengthen momentum when forward earnings are available (reduces uncertainty). SUGGESTION1 used (close, forward_eps). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(forward_eps,90). Confidence 0.59 modest.
Trade mean reversion in stocks with temporarily widened spreads reverting to mean. SUGGESTION1 used (spread, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(spread,10). Confidence 0.55 execution-sensitive.
Rank earnings surprise within sector and trade top decile. SUGGESTION1 used (earnings_surprise, sector_group). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(earnings_surprise,365). Confidence 0.62 sector-focused.

results.idea: Momentum on analyst target price changes
results.description: Stocks with upward target price revisions show subsequent momentum. SUGGESTION1 used (target_price_change, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(target_price_change,90). Confidence 0.6 analyst signals moderate.
Exploit mispriced skew across options vs realized returns tail risk. SUGGESTION1 used (option_skew, realized_tail). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(option_skew,30). Confidence 0.49 complex.
Fade extreme after-hours moves into the open. SUGGESTION1 used (after_hours_return, open). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(after_hours_return,5). Confidence 0.56 intraday bias.
Stocks often mean-revert after index inclusion pop; fade short-term. SUGGESTION1 used (inclusion_flag, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(inclusion_flag,20). Confidence 0.5 event-specific.
Score stocks by trend persistence (ts_ir) and trade top persistent names. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,20). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.67 persistence helps.

Use vector exposures (factor loadings) and average to get concentration signal. Applied SUGGESTION2 via vec_avg(factor_loadings). SUGGESTION1: combine with close optionally. Confidence 0.6 factor-aware.
Use group_backfill to fill missing momentum data and compute z-score. SUGGESTION1 applied (close) and SUGGESTION3 to backfill. SUGGESTION4: close is well-populated. Confidence 0.65 improves coverage.
Trade pairs: long weak relative vs strong pair expecting spread mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 used (close pair A, close pair B). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both closes. Confidence 0.6 classic strategy.
Normalize momentum by group_std_dev to avoid sector-level turbulence. SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_group). SUGGESTION4: group operators applied. Confidence 0.64 reduces sector risk.
Trade firms with positive product launch sentiment and volume uptick. SUGGESTION1 used (sentiment_score, volume). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(sentiment_score,30). Confidence 0.5 event-dependent.
Favor momentum in stocks with rising institutional ownership (supports trend). SUGGESTION1 used (inst_ownership, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(inst_ownership,90). Confidence 0.61 supportive.
Fade deviations from intraday VWAP expecting reversion. SUGGESTION1 used (vwap, price). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(vwap,5). Confidence 0.59 intraday.
Apply winsorize to returns before z-scoring to reduce outlier impact. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: backfill close if needed. Confidence 0.66 robustification.
Avoid momentum in instruments with extreme kurtosis (tail risk). SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,20). Confidence 0.6 risk-aware.
Apply ts_decay_linear to emphasize recent returns. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). Confidence 0.68 recency improves signal.
Divide yield/carry by recent volatility for risk-adjusted carry ranking. SUGGESTION1 used (yield, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(yield,252). Confidence 0.63 risk-aware.
Apply hump to momentum signal to reduce turnover while preserving signal. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). Confidence 0.64 reduces costs.
Use ts_regression slope of analyst revisions to detect accelerating improvement. SUGGESTION1 used (analyst_revision). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(analyst_revision,180). Confidence 0.58 moderate.

results.idea: Momentum with group neutralize and scale
results.description: Compute momentum then group_neutralize and scale to booksize. SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_group). SUGGESTION4: group ops used. Confidence 0.69 stabilizes exposures.
If group_count of liquid names falls suddenly, individual names revert. SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_group via group_count). SUGGESTION3: backfill close. Confidence 0.53 niche.
Select assets with high information ratio over recent window and trade them. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,20). Confidence 0.66 IR is direct objective.
Companies with positive cashflow surprises show momentum. SUGGESTION1 used (cashflow_surprise, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(cashflow_surprise,365). Confidence 0.57 fundamentals anchored.

results.idea: Pair trade via vec_range of exposures
results.description: Use vector factor exposures range to pick pairs with divergent exposures (mean revert). SUGGESTION2 used vec_range(factor_vector). SUGGESTION1 combined with close optional. Confidence 0.55 factor-based.
Winsorize returns then scale to reduce influence of outliers and size. SUGGESTION1 used (close, market_cap). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). Confidence 0.67 robust.
Fade extreme price moves after clustered analyst downgrades (overreaction). SUGGESTION1 used (analyst_actions, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(analyst_actions,30). Confidence 0.51 event-specific.
Trade names gaining vs sector leader (momentum relative). SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_leader close via group_mean). SUGGESTION3: backfill closes. Confidence 0.62 relative strength useful.
Use institutional estimate revisions to detect momentum. SUGGESTION1 used (inst_est_revision, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(inst_est_revision,90). Confidence 0.56 data-dependent.
Favor carry opportunities with benign skew indicators. SUGGESTION1 used (carry, implied_skew). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(implied_skew,30). Confidence 0.52 nuanced.
Use ts_quantile to stabilize time-series rank before cross-sectional zscore. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). Confidence 0.66 improves stability.
Fade extreme drops after guidance cuts if sell-off overshoots fundamentals. SUGGESTION1 used (guidance_change, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(guidance_change,90). Confidence 0.5 event-dependent.
Apply momentum specifically in small-cap growth bucket (style + size). SUGGESTION1 used (close, market_cap, growth_metric). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(market_cap,252). Confidence 0.59 style-specific.

results.idea: Momentum with group_scale to avoid concentration
results.description: Apply group_scale after momentum computation to avoid overexposure to any group. SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_group). SUGGESTION4: group ops used. Confidence 0.65 risk-limiting.

When liquidity falls sharply, expect temporary sell pressure that can revert. SUGGESTION1 used (liquidity_metric, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(liquidity_metric,20). Confidence 0.53 execution-risky.

Aggregated momentum of names reporting earnings in same window (peer spillovers). SUGGESTION1 used (earnings_date, earnings_surprise, sector_group). SUGGESTION3: backfill earnings_date. Confidence 0.56 event-clustered.
Activate momentum only in favorable macro regimes (low rates or low vol). SUGGESTION1 used (close, macro_indicator). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(macro_indicator,20). Confidence 0.63 regime-aware.
Short-term positive drift following buyback announcements. SUGGESTION1 used (buyback_flag, close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(buyback_flag,30). Confidence 0.58 announcement-driven.
Enter when a stock achieves local maximum of returns over lookback (momentum confirmation). SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). Confidence 0.6 trade-timing enhancement.

Sum vector holdings changes across funds to detect flow-driven momentum. Applied SUGGESTION2 using vec_sum(holdings_vector). SUGGESTION3: backfill holdings_vector if sparse. Confidence 0.58 flow-driven.

Apply group_zscore to momentum to detect relative out/under-performance within groups. SUGGESTION1 used (close, sector_group). SUGGESTION4 group ops. Confidence 0.66 group-relative improves selection.
Favor high-yield names with low turnover (sticky yield). SUGGESTION1 used (yield, turnover). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(turnover,20). Confidence 0.54 conservative.

Aggregate insider buys across filings vector to derive momentum signal. SUGGESTION2 applied vec_sum(insider_buy_vector). SUGGESTION3: backfill filings vector. Confidence 0.57 insider flows informative.
Scale momentum time-series to [0,1] before ranking cross-sectionally to stabilize across regimes. SUGGESTION1 used (close). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(close,5). Confidence 0.65 normalization helpful.
